variables.description: The type of VPN connection this virtual private gateway supports.
variables.name: Type

variables.description: The ID of the customer gateway. This can either be an embedded JSON object or a                   reference to a Gateway ID.
variables.name: CustomerGatewayId

variables.description: Indicates whether the VPN connection requires static routes.
variables.name: StaticRoutesOnly
variables.required: Conditional: If you are creating a VPN                   connection for a device that does not support Border Gateway Protocol (BGP), you                   must specify true.

variables.description: The tags that you want to attach to the resource.
variables.name: Tags

variables.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway. This can either be an embedded JSON                   object or a reference to a Gateway ID.
variables.name: VpnGatewayId
